mapper.update: update PRODUCTTBL set pro_qty=pro_qty-#{pd1} where pro_num=#{pd2}
mapper.select: select * from PRODUCTTBL where pro_num=#{pd2} AND PRO_QTY>=#{pd1}

select bb.*,cc.RATE from (select b.*,c.cupon_type from(select * from CUPON_LIST where user_id=#{id}) b left join cupon_base c on b.cupon_base = c.NUM) bb left join CUPON_TYPE cc on bb.cupon_type=cc.CUPON_NUM
mapper.delete: delete CUPON_LIST where user_id=#{id} and CUPON_LIST_ID=#{cupon}
